result.eng: That one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ga: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.orig: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéag
result.html: Tá sé sin imithe cheana féin ach tá ceann eile ann ag ceathrú chun a dó dhéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé sin imiṫe ċeana féin aċ tá ceann eile ann ag ceaṫrú ċun a dó ḋéagThat one [a bus] has left already, but there is another one at 11.45.
